N

notifyPass(Player) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
notifyPass must be called by a player who is passing on a turn.
notifyUNO(Player) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
This method should be called when the player has one card left in their hand.
notifyWon(Player) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
This method must be called when a player has played the last card in their hand.
numberOfCards() - Method in class uno.cards.Deck
This method returns the number of cards in the Deck.
numberOfCards() - Method in class uno.cards.Hand
This method returns the number of cards in the player's hand.
numberOfCards() - Method in class uno.player.Player
The numberOfCards method reports the number of cards in the player's hand.
numCards4EachPlayer() - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The method numCards4EachPlayer returns an array containing the number of cards in each player's hand with the exception of the player making the call.
numCardsInHands - Variable in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
Array of 4 players values: 1, 4, 2, 10
